i1.name: Aegis Protection
i1.blurb: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pantheon''' gains a stack of ''Aegis Protection'' when he lands a [[basic attack]] or casts an ability, up to a maximum of 4. Upon reaching 4 stacks, he consumes all stacks and gains ''Aegis Protection''.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Aegis Protection:}} '''Pantheon''' blocks the next incoming basic attack from an enemy [[champion]], large [[monster]], or the next incoming shot from a [[turret]].
i1.description3: ''Stacks of Aegis Protection cannot be gained during the blocking, also he cannot gain 2 Aegis Protection at the same time.''
notes: * ''Aegis Protection'' consistently negates all [[on-hit effect]]s attached to basic attacks, with a few exceptions ({{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}}, {{ai|Devastating Charge|Hecarim}}).
* Abilities with on-hit effects ({{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}, {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}) will be negated.

riot.name: Spear Shot
riot.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
riot.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage.

q1.name: Spear Shot
q1.blurb: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' hurls his spear at the target enemy, dealing them {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}.
q1.description2: ''Certain Death'' causes ''Spear Shot'' to deal {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.

riot.name: Aegis of Zeonia
riot.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
riot.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and stunning them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

w1.name: Aegis of Zeonia
w1.blurb: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, dealing them {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second, and gaining {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}}.
notes: * ''Aegis of Zeonia'' will be interrupted if ''Pantheon'' is disabled mid-dash, but will not prevent {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}} from being activated.
** This enables ''Pantheon'' to block an attack while mid-dash.
* Since ''Aegis of Zeonia's'' is a targeted ability, targets who move out of its range will still be stunned.
* Casting ''Aegis of Zeonia'' activates {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}} without removing any stacks ''Pantheon'' already applied when so.

e1.description2: {{sbc|Active}}: '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a cone in front of him at {{fd|0.25}} seconds intervals. The total damage is reduced to 60% against non-champions.
e1.leveling2:
{{st|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Physical Damage Per Strike|{{ap|100/3 to 300/3}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Total Damage to Non-Champions|{{ap|100*0.6 to 300*0.6}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Damage Per Strike to Non-Champions|{{ap|100*0.6/3 to 300*0.6/3}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single tick's worth of damage.

riot.name: Grand Skyfall
riot.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
riot.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ damage }} magic damage to enemies at the center (down to {{ edgedamageratio*100 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ cancelcd }} second cooldown.

r1.name: Grand Skyfall
r1.blurb: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' begins {{tip|channels|channeling}} and, after 2 seconds, leaps into the air and becomes {{tip|untargetable}}. He then {{tip|blinks}} to the target location and plummets down, striking after 2 seconds and becoming targetable once more.
r1.description2: Enemies within the impact zone take {{as|magic damage}}, increased by up to 100% based on their proximity to the epicenter, and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 35% for 1 second.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 500 3}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|200*2 to 500*2 3}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.description3: ''Grand Skyfall's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to 30 seconds if the channel is interrupted or canceled.
notes: * '''Pantheon''' is considered to have moved to ''Grand Skyfall's'' target location as soon as he finishes leaping (but he is still targetable for the entire channel despite visually disappearing).
** Enemies will still be damaged if '''Pantheon''' is disabled before landing.
